availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Ohio resident. Ohio native. Married to Adam J. Surface in Kenton County, Kentucky, on March 19, 1864. Mother of James Surface. Resident of Ohio in 1864. Accused of bigamy in Kenton County, Kentucky, in 1865.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Ohio, Montgomery County, Wayne Township, p. 816B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Kenton County Marriages, Film 001943299.
"Death of Mrs. Surface," Independence Daily Reporter (Independence, KS), October 25, 1917, p. 6.
"Elizabeth E. Snyder Surface (1838-1917)," Find A Grave, Memorial 30260074, accessed November 15, 2023, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/30260074.
